title: Looking for book on the business side of Graphic Design.
content: I'm looking for recommendations on a good book on the business side of Graphic Design. I would like a title that is well-respected within the industry and something I will reference repeatedly. Any suggestions would be great.
author: ModernLover

comments.content:
Better to "bump" your other thread.  
 [http://typophile.com/node/65738](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012081101/http:/typophile.com/node/65738 "http://typophile.com/node/65738")
